# Introduction
[sangeranalyseR](https://github.com/roblanf/sangeranalyseR) is an R package that provides fast, flexible, and reproducible workflows for assembling your sanger seuqencing data into contigs. It adds to a list of already widely-used tools, like Geneious, CodonCode Aligner and Phred-Phrap-Consed;.
